hero_description: At WingFox, creating a safe environment for all users is our top priority. If you encounter any trouble or concerns, please let us know â€” no matter how small.
report_description: If you find an inappropriate persona or conversation, please report it here.
report_description_2: We will respond promptly based on our community guidelines.
details_placeholder: Describe the specific situation or problematic conversation...
required_error: Please fill in the required fields
submit_success_desc: We will review and take action as necessary.
faq_q1: My AI persona made an unintended statement
faq_a1: AI responds based on training data, but may occasionally make inappropriate statements. You can send immediate feedback via the 'flag' icon in the chat screen, or report details through this form. There is no impact on your compatibility score.
faq_q2: Can I block a specific user?
faq_a2: Yes. You can block from the chat screen or user profile. Blocking will stop matching with that user and all related personas.
faq_q3: What happens after I submit a report?
faq_a3: Submitted reports are reviewed by the moderation team and AI monitoring system within 24 hours. If a violation is confirmed, the target account will receive a warning or be suspended.
support_description: If the issue persists, please contact our support team directly.
privacy_policy: strictly managed under our Privacy Policy
